root.name: Detour
root.description: The game features five difficulty levels, a map editor, enemies with good AI and support co-op play. The campaign consists of 27 levels.PC System RequirementsOperating System: Windows XP/Vista/7Processor: 1 GHzRAM Memory: 512 MBHard Disk Space: 160 MBVideo Card: DirectX 9 and Shader Model 1.1 supportDirectX: 9.0cSound Card: DirectX 9 Compatible
